item.title: 商界游说团称爱尔兰经济增长将因招聘放缓而放缓
item.description: 爱尔兰最大的商业游说团体预计，由于招聘放缓，2026 年的经济增长将有所放缓。【原文：Ireland’s biggest business lobby group expects economic growth to moderate in 2026 on a hiring slowdown.】

item.title: 美国和欧盟需求增长带动日本出口增长
item.description: 由于美国和欧盟的需求猛增，抵消了对中国出口的下降，日本的出口增幅为 2 月份以来最大。【原文：Japan’s exports rose by the most since February as demand jumped in the US and EU, offsetting a drop in shipments to China.】

item.title: GoTo 的反弹取决于股东投票，Grab 合并有望实现
item.description: 在股东大会召开之前，去哪儿集团的股票出现了新生迹象，这可能有助于为其期待已久的与更大的竞争对手 Grab Holdings Ltd. 的合并铺平道路。【原文：Shares of GoTo Group are seeing signs of new life ahead of a shareholders’ meeting that may help pave the way for its long-awaited merger with larger rival Grab Holdings Ltd.】

item.title: 特朗普下令封锁委内瑞拉附近海域油轮后石油价格大涨
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统通过封锁油轮加大对委内瑞拉的压力之后，石油从2021年以来的最低水平上涨，而全球供应过剩膨胀的迹象继续笼罩着市场。【原文：Oil rose from the lowest level since 2021 after President Donald Trump ramped up pressure on Venezuela with a blockade of tankers, while signs of a swelling global glut continue to hang over the market.】

item.title: 惠誉以财政赤字为由将哥伦比亚进一步降至 "垃圾 "级
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）将哥伦比亚的信用评级下调一档，将其降至垃圾级，理由是持续的巨额预算赤字将加重该国的债务负担。【原文：Fitch Ratings downgraded Colombia’s credit rating one notch deeper into junk territory, citing persistently large budget deficits that will add to the nation’s debt load.】

item.title: 房价下跌，新加坡大华银行在香港和中国房地产贷款方面举步维艰
item.description: 新加坡一家顶级银行在香港和中国房地产上的巨额赌注正适得其反，该银行正面临着该地区日益恶化的房地产市场带来的越来越多的麻烦。【原文：A large wager on Hong Kong and China real estate is backfiring on one of Singapore’s top banks, which is facing up to mounting troubles in the region’s deteriorating property markets.】

item.title: 台湾保险公司因储备金增加而削减货币对冲至创纪录水平
item.description: 台湾的人寿保险公司已将货币对冲降至历史最低水平，同时提高了对外汇风险的缓冲，使自己有更大的能力应对任何潜在的波动。【原文：Taiwan’s life insurers have cut their currency hedging to a record low, while boosting their buffer against foreign-exchange risks to give themselves a greater capacity to ride out any potential volatility.】

item.title: 美国就业数据不温不火，未能刺激降息押注，黄金走势平稳
item.description: 周二美国就业数据低迷，但并未打动市场对进一步降息的预期，黄金走势平稳。【原文：Gold was steady, after sluggish US jobs data on Tuesday didn’t move the needle on expectations for more interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: KIK Custom 获得包括 Oaktree 在内的新贷款人的救援贷款
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，KIK Custom Products Inc.从包括橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management）在内的新贷款人处获得了 1.5 亿美元的救援贷款，以帮助这家清洁产品公司弥补潜在的流动资金缺口。【原文：KIK Custom Products Inc. received a $150 million rescue loan from new lenders, including Oaktree Capital Management to help the cleaning-products company bridge a potential liquidity shortfall, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 中国市场的复苏取决于黯淡经济的转机
item.description: 中国市场今年摆脱了 "不可投资 "的标签。投资者认为，要想永远摆脱 "不可投资 "的标签，国内经济必须加速发展，这样才能避免牛市昙花一现。【原文：China’s markets shed the “uninvestable” tag this year. To bury it for good, investors say an acceleration in the domestic economy is needed so the bullishness doesn’t fizzle out.】

item.title: 墨西哥炼油业创 11 年新高，关键工厂加紧生产
item.description: 历时三年，墨西哥最大的石油加工厂终于接近满负荷运转。这使得墨西哥的炼油量达到了十多年来的最高水平。【原文：It took about three years, but now Mexico’s largest oil-processing plant is finally running at close to full tilt. That’s sending refining in the nation to the highest in more than a decade.】
